title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.5 - Meter records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.5 - Meter records

State Regulations
(a) For all
steam meters installed on customers' premises records shall be maintained which
identify the year purchased, the manufacturer, the type, the identifying
number, the nameplate data relative to the rating of the meter, the location, and the date of last test. Such records shall be sufficient to identify all
associated meters and accessory equipment affecting the accuracy of the
billing. (b) The test record of
each meter and meter device installed on customers' premises shall be retained
until a superseding test is made, but for a period of not less than two
years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
400.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
